phrs.translation: 未覆盖的, 无覆盖的
裸甲板, 无覆盖甲板, 无遮甲板, 无覆甲板

sentences.sentence: By now the imperial Charlemagne might have unsheathed Joyeuse.
sentences.translation: 到如今，查理曼大帝或许该将“咎瓦尤斯”拔剑出鞘了。

sentences.sentence: Fei Long faced the last room at the end of the narrow hallway, unsheathed his sword and kicked the door open.
sentences.translation: 狭长走廊尽头最后一间屋子，飞龙站在门前，一手拔出剑来，一脚踹开门。
